assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was conducted according to the guidelines of the Declaration of Helsinki, and approved by the Institutional Review Board of the Research Ethics Committee of Galicia (Comité Ético de Investigación Galicia; the only IEC authorized in this autonomous region); Number: 2015/608; Approval: 18-November-2015; Title: DISECMAS: Bases genéticas de la discapacidad intelectual: aplicación de las nuevas tecnologías de secuenciación masiva al análisis de variantes genéticas. Informed consent was obtained from all participants included in the study.
